description:
MimeKit is an Open Source library for creating and parsing MIME, S/MIME and PGP messages on desktop and mobile platforms. It also supports parsing of Unix mbox files.

Unlike any other .NET MIME parser, MimeKit's parser does not need to parse string input nor does it use a TextReader. Instead, it parses raw byte streams, thus allowing it to better support undeclared 8bit text in headers as well as message bodies. It also means that MimeKit's parser is significantly faster than other .NET MIME parsers.

MimeKit's parser also uses a real tokenizer when parsing the headers rather than regex or string.Split() like most other .NET MIME parsers. This means that MimeKit is much more RFC-compliant than any other .NET MIME parser out there, including the commercial implementations.

In addition to having a far superior parser implementation, MimeKit's object tree is not a derivative of System.Net.Mail objects and thus does not suffer from System.Net.Mail's massive limitations or bugs.
releaseNotes:
* Added fallback logic to check S/MIME certificates for the encryption capabilities (rfc4262).
* Modified the X509CertificateDatabase to be case-insensitive when matching certificate fingerprints.
* Added a new subclass of MailboxAddress called SecureMailboxAddress which allows specifying a certificate fingerprint.
* Modified MimeMessage.Sender to be a MailboxAddress instead of an InternetAddressList to better enforce rfc5322.
* Added ResentSender, ResentFrom, ResentTo, ResentCc, ResentBcc, ResentMessageId, and ResentDate properties to MimeMessage.
* Added convenience methods on MimeMessage to Sign, Encrypt and SignAndEncrypt the message which can be used for S/MIME or OpenPGP.
* Improved API documentation.
summary: An Open Source library for creating and parsing MIME, S/MIME and PGP messages on desktop and mobile platforms.
title: MimeKit: A complete MIME library with support for S/MIME and PGP
